effect_description.long_desc_key: Master yourself, master the enemy.

perk.name: perkSprinter
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of sprinting from/to any sound you hear. Your sprinting speed increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your sprinting speed by 4%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 8%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 12%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 16%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 20%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 24%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 28%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 32%.
Increase your sprinting speed by 36%.
Your speed equals that of Usain Bolt. Increase your sprinting speed by 50%.

perk.name: perkSurvivalist
perk.desc_key: You are conditioning your body to the maximum limits. Your tolerance towards the elements increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 2.
Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 4.

Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 16.

You've mastered the art of surviving in the wilderness, you even grill bears! Increase your resistance agains heat and cold by 25.

perk.name: perkCalisthenics
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the excercising method of only using your body, enforcing a daily training regime and a balanced diet. Your maximum health and stamina increase.

perk.name: perkScavenger
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of collecting every piece of scrap and armor you find lying around and then wearing it. Your damage reduction increases.

Hypocrite that you are to trust the chemicals in your brain to tell you they are chemicals. All knowledge is ultimately based on that which we cannot prove. Will you fight like a man or perish like a dog? Increase the healing effectivnes of medical items by 50%.

perk.name: perkDoublePen
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of penetration. Enemy armor reduced and penetration count increased.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Ignore an additional 2% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate an additional target or a block of up to 250 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 4% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate an additional target or a block of up to 250 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 8% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate two additional targets or blocks of up to 500 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 10% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate two additional targets or blocks of up to 500 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 12% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate two additional targets or blocks of up to 500 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

Ignore an additional 14% of armor with firearms, archery and spears. Armor-piercing rounds can penetrate three additional targets or blocks of up to 750 extra hit points when using Hunting, Marksman or Sniper Rifles.

perk.name: perkBowman
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of the bow. If thou are of pure heart the arrow shall miss, if thou are not, the arrow shall tear thee asunder.

perk.name: perkSharpshooter
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the arts of sidearms. Every aspect of handgun handling increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 4% and reduce their spread by an additional 2%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 8% and reduce their spread by an additional 4%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 12% and reduce their spread by an additional 6%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 16% and reduce their spread by an additional 8%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 20% and reduce their spread by an additional 10%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 24% and reduce their spread by an additional 12%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 28% and reduce their spread by an additional 14%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 32% and reduce their spread by an additional 16%.
Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 36% and reduce their spread by an additional 18%.
You are now the good, the bad and the ugly. Increase your fire rate, entity damage, weapon handling, reload speed with sidearms by 50% and reduce their spread by an additional 25%.

perk.name: perkRobotics
perk.desc_key: You are mastering the art of robotics. Your turret control range and magazine size increases.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 9, fire rate by 6% and the maximum range at which they are active by 9%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 18, fire rate by 12% and the maximum range at which they are active by 18%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 27, fire rate by 18% and the maximum range at which they are active by 27%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 36, fire rate by 24% and the maximum range at which they are active by 36%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 45, fire rate by 30% and the maximum range at which they are active by 45%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 54, fire rate by 36% and the maximum range at which they are active by 54%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 63, fire rate by 42% and the maximum range at which they are active by 63%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 72, fire rate by 48% and the maximum range at which they are active by 72%.
Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 81, fire rate by 54% and the maximum range at which they are active by 81%.
Go Gadget, go! Increase the magazine size of junk turrets by 100, fire rate by 66%, the maximum range at which they are active by 100% and have 1 additional turret active at the samme time.
